about_the_game:
A classic RPG about one girl's journey to save the people of the Omega Empire!

  • 10+ hours of gameplay
  • A JRPG from veteran doujin creators

CHARACTER


A skilled assassin who boasts a 100% success rate for assassination missions. She is known as the Black Reaper because of her hair color and reliable assassination record. Although her skin and hair color suggest that she is from the East, she has no memory of her birthplace.

She has no particular interest in other people, especially the opposite sex. However, when she was once severely wounded while on a mission as a novice, she gave her heart to the young man who saved her. They became lovers, although she has been concealing the fact that she is an assassin from him.

SUMMARY

The people of the Omega Empire suffer under the oppressive rule of Emperor Duke. Egregious violence—and possibly death—awaits anyone attempting to defy the crushingly heavy taxes…


The population at large live in fear of their Imperial overlords. However, a brave few have risen up to destroy the Empire—the resistance movement Ψ (Psi), headed by the renegade leader Edgar.

On the surface, they work as jacks-of-all-trades, helping citizens in need. Below the surface, the organization's main activity is "purging"—that is to say, assassinating—Imperial officials and criminals alike. Anyone who brings suffering to the populace could be next.

One of the members of Ψ is a beautiful, dark-haired woman who hardly looks the part of an assassin. With her beloved sword Oborozuki, which she received from Edgar, in hand, Hazuki is ready to face the empire once again...

content_descriptors.notes: Contains suggestive themes, sexual references, brief depictions of threats and harassment, mild violence, crude humor and crass language.
